original_text: So they feared the Lord but also served their own gods, after the manner of the nations from among whom they had been carried away.
korean_text: 이와 같이 그들이 여호와도 경외하고 또한 어디서부터 옮겨왔든지 그 민족의 풍속대로 자기의 신들도 섬겼더라

sentences.original_text: but also served their own gods
after the manner of the nations
from among whom they had been carried away
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 민족들 가운데서 사로잡혀 왔습니다
